title: TATTOO Berlin International Film Festival Crystal Bear Award

sources.title: TATTOO Berlin International Film Festival Crystal Bear Award
sources.description: TATTOO Directed by Farhad Delaram Iran, 2019 Short 15 min. Synopsis A scar and a tattoo seal the fate of a young Iranian woman. During a routine examination to renew her driving licence, the officials suddenly become convinced that they have uncovered a problematic psychological condition.
